attributes.action: Abolish VAT on electricity and fuel.
attributes.additional_details: 46% of the money spent on petrol is tax. This is ridiculous. If we abolished this completely energy & fuel companies would immediately have pressure taken off them. But this wouldn’t just benefit the cooperations, it would take huge pressure off the working class as by not having prices inflated further due to tax.
attributes.background: During this cost of living crisis it is completely unacceptable for the state to be taxing fuel and energy which inflates the cost even more.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for the same actions:

Suspend VAT on road fuels to reduce fuel costs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610567

Remove 5% VAT rate on gas and electric bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/615739
